Package views

Class DayView

  • java.lang.Object
    • views.DayView
  • public class DayView
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the main view of the game. Creates and builds the frame with all the required buttons and labels to interact and keep up to date with the game. Most components are returned so the events can be handled in the game env and the labels changed accordingly.
    Author:
    ctg31

      Create the application.
